thread.title: Government Bonds Weaken as Oil Hits Fresh Multiyear High

author: Akane Otani
title: Government Bonds Weaken as Oil Hits Fresh Multiyear High
text:
U.S. government bonds were hit by a fresh wave of selling Wednesday as crude oil rallied, driving up inflation expectations and chipping away at investor demand for government debt.
The yield on the benchmark 10-year Treasury note settled at 3.004%, compared with 2.968% Tuesday, ending higher for a fourth consecutive session. Yields rise as bond prices fall.
Bond...
